text: كَذَٰلِكَ ٱلْعَذَابُ ۖ وَلَعَذَابُ ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ أَكْبَرُ ۚ لَوْ كَانُوا۟ يَعْلَمُونَ

translation.en.sahih: Such is the punishment [of this world]. And the punishment of the Hereafter is greater, if they only knew.
translation.id.indonesian: Seperti itulah azab (dunia). Dan sesungguhnya azab akhirat lebih besar jika mereka mengetahui.
